pages.text: The lungs are an essential part to any body. They provide oxygen so that biological components can metabolize calories. It's blood-oxygen concentration is independent of blood-calorie concentration. It can be connected to the circulatory system in any place, as long as it has one input and one output line

pages.title: Lungs
pages.text: Lungs are dropped from living entities when killed with a scalpel in either the off-hand or main-hand. It's health is determined by the maximum health of the parent entity. Elder guardians are pretty good for a late-game oxygen solution.

pages.title: Oxygen Pump
pages.text: Required to allow the lungs to breathe. It's reflex is triggered by a low concentration of oxygen in the blood stream.
